revised_title: Telecommunications in the 1980s and Beyond: A Discussion Meeting
tldr: This article discusses the importance of telecommunications technology in transforming industries throughout the 20th century and looks forward to the medium-term developments in the 1980s and beyond. The author emphasizes the need for discussion and collaboration among engineers, technologists, and applied scientists to anticipate and adapt to these advancements. The article highlights a discussion meeting organized by the Royal Society, bringing together experts from various fields to share their insights and perspectives on the future of telecommunications.
